pages.text: The Fluidizer can process materials in the following three different modality, depending on the type and number of Injectors in the machine:$(br2)$(li)$(o)Solid mode :$() turn solid fuel sources (like ingots) into fluid fuel. To enable this modality you need one, and only one, Solid Injector in the machine.

$(li)$(o)Solid Mixing mode :$() turn two solid fuel sources (like ingots) into fluid and mix them to make a new fuel type. To enable this modality you need two, and only two, Solid Injectors in the machine.$(li)$(o)Fluid Mixing mode :$() mix two fluid fuels into a new fuel type. To enable this modality you need two, and only two, Fluid Injectors in the machine.
